function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Decreased working time for group b participants in the initial survey round","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in remote work capabilities over survey rounds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing a small sample size of 97 subjects may lead to a lack of generalizability of the findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collecting survey responses during the covid-19 pandemic may introduce bias due to the impact of the pandemic on respondents’ perspectives and behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using a cross-sectional approach may overlook the dynamic nature of the covid-19 situation, leading to limited insights into longitudinal changes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction professionals may have varied perceptions of the covid-19 impact on construction, leading to a lack of consensus in response planning.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global and regional differences in perceived impacts of covid-19 on construction may lead to localized response plans that do not account for broader patterns of disease propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceptions of professionals at different points in time may not accurately reflect the evolving nature of the pandemic, leading to outdated response plans.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in supply chains","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and inconsistencies in covid-19 statistics due to economic expediencies and ambiguous behavior of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forced stoppage of construction projects leading to fiscal losses for both big and small construction companies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 on the supply chain system, leading to operational and disruption risks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of construction projects due to epidemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial losses in construction companies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable space for foreign direct investment fdi in construction projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial strain on self-employed individuals due to lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in immigrant workers impacting construction projects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in perception of pandemic impact between developed and developing countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effects of covid-19 on the global economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fallout in working hours due to pandemic impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks and adverse effects of covid-19 on tunnel construction sites","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on construction professionals’ performance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction professionals interacting with covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global contagion of covid-19 impacting construction professionals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflexivity in urban soundscapes research","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of the impact of digital methodologies on public health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of diverse experiences in the podcast, particularly those of minority groups and marginalized voices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tightly controlled production environment may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of potential risks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sampling strategy targeting a particular group may limit the representation of diverse experiences and perspectives.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of generalizability in qualitative research may restrict the applicability of insights to broader contexts and populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Podcasting project involves close contact between academics, increasing the risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the academic community.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction between individuals in the streets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Attentiveness to non-human others and the more-than-human city","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Familiarity with lockdown measures leading to complacency","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global circulation of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban soundscape linked to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in suburban streets due to increased pedestrian, jogger, and cyclist activity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowdfunding and volunteer delivery services increasing physical interaction and potential exposure to the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and consideration for front-line workers in essential businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent references to the visceral experience of being in the city under covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People hoarding essential supplies such as toilet paper","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to gather in public spaces leading to new ways of social interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of representation of embodied sounds and communication in scholarly journals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Marginalized people being more physically visible and exposed in cities during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on media for information about the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequitable access to technology and education impacting ability to understand and share experiences during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 disproportionately affecting vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
